int atmi::Tp::acall ( char *  idata = NULL,
long  ilen = 0 
)

acall() sends a request message to the service named by svc.

Parameters: idata - a data buffer preveously allocated with tpalloc() and hols input data ilen - idata buffer lenght.

Returns:
call descriptor if call succeeded else -1
Exceptions:
Anexception is raised upon failure
int atmi::Tp::acall ( Buffer *  buffer)

acall() sends a request message to the service named by svc.

Parameters: buffer - a fielded buffer preveously allocated with tpalloc() and hols input data

Returns:
call descriptor if call succeeded else -1
Exceptions:
Anexception is raised upon failure
int atmi::Tp::call ( char *  idata,
long  ilen,
char **  odata,
long *  olen,
int *  urcode = NULL,
int  retries = 0,
int  delay = 0 
)

call() sends a request and synchronously awaits its reply. A call to call () returns 0 if call succeed, -1 when no urcode was found else urcode is returned and should be > 0. All other error conditions are handled through Exceptions.

Parameters:
idataa data buffer preveously allocated with tpalloc() and hols input data
ilenidata buffer lenght.
odataa data buffer preveously allocated with tpalloc() and that will hold returned data by the called service.
olenreponse buffer length.
urcodeuser return code (see tpreturn)
retriescall is attempted at most retries times.
delaydelay in seconds between each retry.
Returns:
tpurcode if TPESVCFAIL a user returned code (tpurcode) > 0
-1 is retuened upon service failure TPFAIL and tpurcode == 0
0 TPSUCCESS is returned
Exceptions:
ServiceExceptionUpon TPESVCERR.
TimeoutExceptionUpon TPETIME.
TuxedoExceptionthrown for the other error conditions.
int atmi::Tp::call ( Buffer *  buffer,
int *  urcode = NULL,
int  retries = 0,
int  delay = 0 
)

call() sends a request and synchronously awaits its reply. A call to call () returns 0 if call succeed, -1 when no urcode was found else urcode is returned and should be > 0. All other error conditions are handled through Exceptions.

Parameters:
buffera data buffer preveously allocated
urcodeuser return code (see tpreturn)
retriescall is attempted at most retries times.
delaydelay in seconds between each retry.
Returns:
tpurcode if TPESVCFAIL a user returned code (tpurcode) > 0
-1 is retuened upon service failure TPFAIL and tpurcode == 0
0 TPSUCCESS is returned
Exceptions:
ServiceExceptionUpon TPESVCERR.
TimeoutExceptionUpon TPETIME.
TuxedoExceptionthrown for the other error conditions.
int atmi::Tp::call ( char **  idata = NULL,
long *  ilen = 0,
int *  urcode = NULL,
int  retries = 0,
int  delay = 0 
)

call() sends a request and synchronously awaits its reply. A call to call () returns 0 if call succeed, -1 when no urcode was found else urcode is returned and should be > 0. All other error conditions are handled through Exceptions.

Input data buffer is used to as output data buffer.

Parameters:
idataa data buffer preveously allocated with tpalloc() and hols input data
ilenidata buffer lenght.
urcodeuser return code (see tpreturn)
retriescall is attempted at most retries times.
delaydelay in seconds between each retry.
Returns:
tpurcode if TPESVCFAIL a user returned code (tpurcode) > 0
-1 is retuened upon service failure TPFAIL and tpurcode == 0
0 TPSUCCESS is returned
Exceptions:
ServiceExceptionUpon TPESVCERR.
TimeoutExceptionUpon TPETIME.
TuxedoExceptionthrown for the other error conditions.
int atmi::Tp::cancel ( int  cd = 0)

Cancel acall.

Parameters:
cd- a call descriptor. if 0 then last acall descriptor is used.

int *  urcode = NULL,
int *  cd = NULL 
)

get reply from preveous acall().

Parameters:
buffer- a fielded buffer preveously allocated with tpalloc() and that will hold returned data by the called service.
urcode- user return code
cd- a call descriptor. if 0 then last acall descriptor is used.
